heading: HR00305
0: A RESOLUTION CONDEMNING IN THE STRONGEST POSSIBLE TERMS THE BOMB ATTACK AT THE ROXAS NIGHT MARKET IN DAVAO CITY ON THE NIGHT OF SEPTEMBER 2, 2016 AND URGING THE GOVERNMENT TO BRING TO JUSTICE THE PERPETRATORS OF SUCH DASTARDLY ACT
status: Pending with the Committee on RULES since 2016-09-06

House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00305
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION CONDEMNING IN THE STRONGEST POSSIBLE TERMS THE BOMB ATTACK AT THE ROXAS NIGHT MARKET IN DAVAO CITY ON THE NIGHT OF SEPTEMBER 2, 2016 AND URGING THE GOVERNMENT TO BRING TO JUSTICE THE PERPETRATORS OF SUCH DASTARDLY ACT
